summary: Changes a few things to allow players to be a stage 4 vampire in public, or transform into the Vampire Lord without becoming targeted by almost all NPC's.
descriptionHtml:
Changes a few things to allow players to be a stage 4 vampire in public, or transform into the Vampire Lord without becoming targeted by almost all NPC's. Not really much else to say, besides about installation.
<br />[center]==INSTALLATION==[/center][center][list]
<br />[*]Open NMM after downloading file
<br />[*]Click add from file under the mods section
<br />[*]Double click it
<br />[*]Done
<br /><br />[/list][/center]
author: TheMightyWaffle
